mapper.select: SELECT managerId, petType, name, age, since, manage, catdog FROM petmanager WHERE catdog=1
SELECT managerId, petType, name, age, since, manage, catdog, repfish, bird FROM petmanager WHERE managerId=#{id}
SELECT managerId, petType, name, age, since, manage, repfish FROM petmanager WHERE repfish=1
SELECT managerId, petType, name, age, since, manage, bird FROM petmanager WHERE bird=1
SELECT managerId, petType, name, age, since, manage, catdog, repfish, bird FROM petmanager ORDER BY managerId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO petmanager (managerId, petType, catdog, repfish, bird, name, age, since, manage) VALUES (#{managerId},#{petType}, #{catdog}, #{repfish}, #{bird}, #{name}, #{age}, #{since}, #{manage})
mapper.update: UPDATE petmanager SET petType = #{petType}, catdog = #{catdog}, repfish = #{repfish}, bird = #{bird}, name = #{name}, age = #{age}, since = #{since}, manage = #{manage} WHERE managerId = #{managerId}
